questions.text: Can you tell me about your current role and how your activities are related to the topic we're discussing?
What are the main challenges or frustrations you encounter in your work or day-to-day business related to this topic?
Can you describe a recent situation where you needed to solve a problem related to this topic?
Do you believe that our new product/service helps you solve this problem?
questions.dimension: DIMENSION 3 (in the REPORT): UNDERSTANDING OF THE NEW SERVICE/OFFER BENEFITS

questions.text: What are the easily identifiable benefits that this service can bring you?
questions.dimension: DIMENSION 3 (in the REPORT): UNDERSTANDING OF THE NEW SERVICE/OFFER BENEFITS

questions.text: What constraints or limits do you perceive in the solution?
questions.dimension: DIMENSION 4 (in the REPORT): COMPLETENESS OF THE SERVICE / OFFER

questions.text: What constraints or frustrations does this service not address?
questions.dimension: DIMENSION 4 (in the REPORT): COMPLETENESS OF THE SERVICE / OFFER

questions.text: Regarding business potential, how do you plan to utilize this new service?
